column1: '''Dimrost''', also known as '''Nen Girith''', was a cascading waterfall on the stream of [[Celebros]], where it flowed down to meet the River [[Taeglin]] on the borders of [[Brethil]].<ref>{{CH
column2: A2M}}</ref> The falls raised a fine spray into the air, from which they took their name, which means "Rainy Stair".  Above Dimrost, the [[Men]] of [[Brethil]] had constructed a wooden bridge to cross the Celebros.
